modName: Frostmourne with Frost emanation Unenchanted with light fx
summary: Is now NOT enchanted ! the\"glow\" plastic effect are removed , frost emanation are a a little bit brighter :) can be enchanted
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Adds forgable Frostmourne (one-handed and two-handed) to the game.
The sword was remade almost from scratch so the polycount is considerably lower than it was.

========================================================================================

  [color=#FF0000] ORIGINAL MOD FROM JOJJO HERE[/color]

-=< [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6348]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor by jojjo[/url] >=-

========================================================================================

 [color=#FF0000] 
Work In Progres :project for animations flames of the weapons:) beta test release  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9162]Flame enchantement animation on sword[/url]
=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+= [/color]

=================================================================================
 [color=\"#8B0000\"]--==UPDATE :  1.2 to 1.3 

 Is now NOT enchanted ! the\"glow\" plastic effect are removed , frost emanation are a a little bit brighter :) can be enchanted
  ==-[/color]
=================================================================================

Location
=======
At a forge - Steel weapons section.

Install  : if you have the version Frostmourne 1.2.esp , remove this because 1.2.esp ist enchanted version 
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Frostmourne v.1.3 unenchanted version.esp and paste\'em in your Skyrim/Data folder. \"Yes to all\" when asked. Start Skyrim Launcher. Go to Data Files and mark Frostmourne v.1.3 unenchanted version.esp , Ok and play.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck Frostmourne v.1.3 unenchanted version.esp in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Frostmourne v.1.3 unenchanted version.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\frostmourne folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\frostmourne folder



Credits
========
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Thanks to Blizzard for the sword concept.
Thanks to JaySus
Thanks to Jojjo

Permission
===========
The model and texture were created for free use. As long as proper credit is given use the mod as you like.
author: Elixiir
